name: Lycanth
description: Lycanths are humanoids with the ability to transform into a wolf or a wolf-humanoid hybrid form. They are often misunderstood and feared due to their cursed nature, but many Lycanths strive to control their transformations and use their abilities for good. In their wolf form, they gain enhanced senses, strength, and speed, but must constantly fight against their primal instincts.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and one additional language of your choice.
special: Shapechanger: As a bonus action, you can transform into a wolf or a wolf-humanoid hybrid for up to 1 hour. You can transform a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all uses after a long rest.
